Package org.treetank.api

TreeTank API This package contains the public TreeTank API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBucketReadTrx
    Read-Transaction of a bucket ensuring read-only access to any buckets.
    IBucketWriteTrx
    Write-Transaction of a bucket ensuring read- and write access to any buckets.
    IFilelistenerReadTrx  
    IFilelistenerWriteTrx  
    IIscsiReadTrx  
    IIscsiWriteTrx
    This interface defines the funcationalities of an IscsiWriteTransaction
    IMetaEntry
    All entries in the MetaBucket must implement this interface for guaranteeing serialization.
    IMetaEntryFactory
    Creating MetaEntries based on the implementation and the bundle.
    INode
    Overall INode-Interface for the interaction with the bucket-layer.
    INodeFactory
    Factory to generate nodes out of raw data.
    INodeReadTrx  
    INodeWriteTrx
    INodeWriteTrx
    ISession
    Each IStorage contains multiple resources.
    IStorage
    This interface describes storage-instances handled by Treetank.

Package org.treetank.api Description

TreeTank API This package contains the public TreeTank API. Users will have to connect to any TreeTank through this API. Note that for common usage, only access-interfaces provided by this package should be used. Treetank is based on three layers of interaction:
  • IStorage: This layer denotes a persistent storage. Each storage can be created using one specific StorageConfiguration. Afterwards, this configuration is valid for the whole lifetime of the database. Each IStorage can hold multiple resources accessible over ISession.
  • ISession: This layer denotes a runtime access on a resource stored in a storage. Only one ISession is allowed at one time. The layer has ability to provide runtime-settings as well. Especially settings regarding the transaction-handling can be provided.
  • IBucketReadTrx/IBucketWriteTrx: This layer provided direct access to the database. All access to nodes used either a IBucketReadTrx or IBucketWriteTrx.
Additional to these access-interfaces, this api-packages provides direct access-methods for the node-structure:
  • INodeFactory: This interface is for deserializing INode-instances in the correct way.
Author:
Marc Kramis, University of Konstanz, Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
